title: Elon Musk Warned To “Stay Away” From Taylor Swift
description:

Fans retaliated and immediately told Musk to “stay away” from her and her work. Musk’s advice for Swift was unsolicited, suggesting that she should post “some music or concert videos directly on the […]

description:

description:
